body_html:
@JGuillaumin I had the same issue a few days ago, but using current master 283f03c, and an additional
apt install libpython2.7-dev in the docker container before calling the build script, it worked for me.

I was also able to generate libtensorflow_framework.so by changing the build target to //tensorflow:libtensorflow_framework.so in ./tensorflow/tools/ci_build/pi/build_raspberry_pi.sh. I haven't tested it on a PI yet, though.
